# all_Obsolete

**Type Property**

The `NSDragOperationAll` constant is deprecated. Use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDragOperation/every] instead.

## Declaration

```swift
static var all_Obsolete: NSDragOperation { get }
```

## Deprecated

- **all**: Use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDragOperation/every] instead.
